title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 81.1 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 81.1 - Application

State Regulations

In order to qualify for State funds pursuant to Education

Law, section 316, each applicant shall submit, on a form prescribed by the
commissioner, a proposal to plan, establish and operate a teacher resource and
computer training center approved by the board of education or board of
cooperative educational services submitting the application or by each such
board of a consortium submitting the application. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
81.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
